MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 and LL13 postcode areas of Wrexham, affecting properties in Bedwell Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.32PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of access and site conditions for engineers to repair a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.30PM on 7th January 2021.
